text: Ufuk Akyol (born 27 August 1997) is a German footballer who plays as a defender for the Turkish club Antalyaspor. ==Professional career== Akyol made his professional debut in a 1-0 Süper Lig win over Göztepe S.K. on 18 August 2019. ==References== ==External links== * Soccerway Profile * TFF Profile * Mackolik Profile * DFB Profile Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:People from Ravensburg Category:German footballers Category:Germany youth international footballers Category:German people of Turkish descent Category:Association football midfielders Category:Antalyaspor footballers Category:Süper Lig players Category:TFF Second League players
title: Ufuk Akyol
